From: Alex Conlon <aconlon@kaplanhecker.com> 
To: 
'S"
Subject: FW: FBI Victim Services Division Briefing for Victims of 
Jeffrey 
Epstein 
Date: Mon, 07 Oct 2019 21:55:52 +0000 
Alex Conlon Ka Ian Hecker 
& 
Fink LLP 
 Original Messa e 
From: (NY) (FBI) ilIMM> 
Sent: Frida , October 4, 2019 3:11 PM 
To: (NY) (FBI) la; VictimServices <victimservices@fbi.gov> 
Subject: RE: FBI Victim Services Division Briefing for Victims of Jeffrey Epstein 
Dear Law Firm - I am reaching back out since today is the requested RSVP date. Thank you so much for your 
assistance in getting the invitation to your clients. We do understand that it was a short turn around, so please 
continue to reach out to us with all those that would like to attend. 
If you are accompanying your client we will also need your RSVP with the following information as the briefing 
will be held in a federal building. 
Information for 
Security: 
Full Name: 
Firm Name: 
Email Address: 
Phone Number: 
Social Security Number: 
Personal Address 
Address 
1: 
Address 
2: 
City: 
State: 
Zip: 
Citizenship: 
Country of Birth: 
Victims Information: 
Please provide the name of the victim(s) you are representing: 
Please identify the briefing you plan to attend: 
Date: October 15, 2019 
Time: 10:00 AM 
Location: 2030 SW 145th Avenue, Miramar, FL 33027 
EFTA00025342

OR 
Date: October 23, 2019 
Time: 10:00 AM 
Location: 290 Broadway, New York, NY 10007 
Please let me know if you have any questions. Thank you again for your support. 
MS 
FBI Victim Specialist 
New York Field Office 
=L. 
 Ori inal Messa e 
From: (NY) (FBI) 
Sent: Friday, September 27, 2019 5:24 PM 
Subject: FBI Victim Services Division Briefing for Victims of Jeffrey Epstein 
Dear Law Firm - if you are receiving this email; you have been identified as representing an identified victim of 
Jeffrey Epstein. Please be advised that you have received an invitation for that individual from the email address 
victimservices@fbi.gov. The FBI Victim Services Division is hosting two briefings for victims on October 15th 
at the Miami Field Office and on October 23rd at the New York Field Office. If you have additional clients that 
did not receive an invitation please respond back to victimservices@fbi.gov with their individual contact 
information. 
If you have any questions please feel free to contact me directly. 
V/R 
MS 
FBI Victim Specialist 
New York Field Office 
=L. 
This email and its attachments may contain information that is confidential and/or protected from disclosure by 
the attorney-client, work product or other applicable legal privilege. If you are not the intended recipient of the 
email, please be aware that any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, dissemination, distribution, or copying of 
this communication, or any of its contents, is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in 
error, please notify the sender immediately and destroy all copies of the message from your computer system. 
Thank you. 
EFTA00025343
